content: Mariposa Medical Center surgery report for patient T385926: Successfully performed laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy on 11/15/2023. Patient had completed 6-month supervised diet program. Medication list included vitamin D3 5000IU daily and fenofibrate 145mg. Follow-up scheduled with endocrinology clinic. Surgeon: Dr. Rajiv Patel. Referring provider: Dr. Mitchell Yuan.
